task.title: Set up Your Phone
task.shortdesc: To use VoIP extensions, you need to register the extensions on your IP phones or soft phones.

context.p: Yeastar provides Linkus mobile client. Linkus helps you set up your phone efficiently and links you and your colleagues and customers anywhere anytime.
We have tested a number of IP phones and soft phones with . Below is an example of registering an extension on Yealink phones.

p.b: Register an Extension on Yealink Phone

step.cmd: Log in the Yealink phone web interface, click Account tab.
From the Account drop-down list, select an available account.

ul.li: Label: The name you want to display on the phone screen.
Display Name: The name you want to display on another person's phone screen when you are calling the phone.
Register Name: Enter the extension's Registration Name.
User Name: Enter the extension number.
Password: Enter the extension's Registration Password.
SIP Server Host: Enter the PBX's domain or IP address.
Port: Enter the PBX's SIP port.

taskbody.result: If the extension is registered, you can see the Register Status shows "Registered" on the Account page.
